member.name: T:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.OCPlatformProvider
member.summary: Provide interaction between sync client and Open Contacts. This class will be wired to SyncFacade. Open Contacts won't be loaded until the first request.

member.name: P:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.OCPlatformProvider.OCSync
member.summary: Connection to Open Contacts when requested

member.name: P:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.OCPlatformProvider.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Error message generated by the platform
